author: Tony Tobin
method: Place all the ingredients into a food processor and blend. To serve, pour into a glass filled with ice cubes and season, to taste, with  salt and freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: 200ml/7oz passata,  1 lime, juice only,  ½ tsp Tabasco sauce,  ½ tsp Worcestershire sauce,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  handful ice cubes,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
